general_advisory: According to the weather forecast, Bolangir district is likely to receive very light rainfall for the upcoming 5 days with generally cloudy sky. Maximum temperature will range from 29-33°C and minimum temperature from 19-25°C. Maximum relative humidity will be 88-93% and minimum relative humidity will be 63-71%. The wind speed will range from 14 to 16 kmph for the upcoming 5 days.

advisory: The crop is at active tillering stage. Low temperature below 28°C and high relative humidity more than 70% favor infestation of Yellow stem borer in rice. To manage this pest, apply Cartap Hydrochloride 4% G or Chlorantraniliprole 0.4% GR or Imidacloprid 0.3% GR by mixing it with sand.

Chilli crop is at seedling stage. High soil moisture & moderate soil temperature, high RH, high rainfall, and poor drainage during this rainy season may cause damping off disease. Drench the soil with Mancozeb or foliar spray with Metalaxyl or Metalaxyl+Mancozeb.

Brinjal is at flowering to fruiting stage. Favorable conditions for Shoot and fruit borer in Brinjal may occur. To manage this pest, remove affected terminal shoots and fruits, install pheromone traps, and use chemical control. Apply Emamectin Benzoate 5% SG or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% SC or Spinetoram 11.7% SC with proper intervals.
